name: Sangeeth Shatranj
description:
Sangeeth Shatranj at NIE Mysuru

Sometimes Music is the only thing that takes your mind off everything else.

Sangeeth Shatranj, a state level Carnatic Music Contest, commemorates musicians' contribution.

The competition consist of 3 categories: Vocal, Instrumental and Percussion solo performances.

Accompanists will be provided to all the performers.

For  vocal and instrumental categories, the participants are expected to present a raga-alapane, kruthi gaayana ,neraval and swara prasthara. Performances will be judged by eminent musicians.

Age: 16-25 years
Date:  6th March 2018
Time: 10am onwards
Venue : Sarvepalli Radhakrishnan Hall
Entry fee: 100/-

The rules and regulations of the contest are as follows: Vocal   and Instrumental music performances: 
1. The main performer will be provided with well equipped accompanists similar to that in a music concert. 
2. 13+2minutes will be provided for each performer(Negotiable). 
3. An item consisting of a short alapana, Neraval and kalpana swaram is appreciable. 
4. After alapana, the performer shall directly shift to the part of the kruthi for which he/she desires to present neraval and kalpana swaram. 
5. Entry fee: Rs.100/-
6. Shruthi box will be provided at the venue.

To Register: 
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSffQBEUCaGhL48Fbc2SxzzSBOEOKrmZ3kSjtI3qDH1qLdHL0A/viewform?c=0&w=1

To stay connected follow us on,

Website: http://www.technieks.in
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC0Ky30GAIfdtGccczVNUIqA
Facebook: https://m.facebook.com/techNIEks
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/technieks_2018/

name: MARATHON
description:
“Tough runs don’t last, tough runners do”.

🏃🏻‍♀It’s time to tighten up your shoes and buckle up to run because techNIEks RUN 2018 is here. 🏃🏻‍♂

Be proud of yourself because you are running for a cause, Belaku- A run for vision. 👁

Venue: Golden Jubilee Complex
Time: 5:45 AM
Date : 4th March, 2018

Categories:MEN
                    WOMEN
                    VETERANS
Entry fee: 100/- For 5K Run
                  150/- For 10K Run

Online link: technieks.in/marathon

Tickets available at: GJB Reception and Decathlon

For more details contact,

Be there, don’t miss!!! It’s time we run for something good.

name: Hackathon
description:
✨✨ techNIEks presents techNIEzzare 2018.✨✨
A series of technical events which will enhance your skills on the whole.

As a part of techNIEzzare the NIE IEEE Student Branch presents a 12 hr Hackathon.💻

This technical event is about designing solutions to the real world problems and contributing technical and social changes to them. Learn, Build and get Mentored by people from industry👨🏻‍💻.

Registrations can be done at registration desk put up in front of GJB entrance.

To register goto: 
technieks.in/hackathon

To stay connected with techNIEks follow us on:

Website: http://www.technieks.in
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC0Ky30GAIfdtGccczVNUIqA
Facebook: https://m.facebook.com/techNIEks
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/technieks_2018/

name: Cyclothon
description:
Early to bed and early to rise 😀 techNIEks 🎉 is round the corner so gear up and get into your cycling shoes because the most awaited techNIEks cyclothon 🚲 is here in our college.
You heard it right it's in our college right in front of Golden Jubilee Block on 25th February at 5:45AM.
It's a 25km cycling  and the theme is Pedal for vision🚲
Be there and make this amazing cyclothon a great grand success😀
For tickets contact the reception desk.

name: Advance Knowledge On Formwork
description:
✨✨ techNIEks presents techNIEzzare 2018.✨✨
A series of technical events which will enhance your skills on the whole.


As a part of techNIEzzare, a workshop on "Advanced knowledge on formwork" is going to be conducted. 🏗

The workshop will be conducted by Mr.Dilip Srinivas, faculty of Civil engineering department.
 
Make use of this chance to learn from the eminent and the experienced!

Date: 24th Feb 2018
Venue: MV hall, GJB block.
Time: 2pm onwards.

name: PAPER PRESENTATION
description:
Our Work Is the Presentation Of Our Capabilities
techNIEks 2018, presents the best way to express your knowledge through PAPER PRESENTATION.
All the research oriented contributors can present their papers and express their opinions on their area of interest. Judges go through all the papers and come to a conclusion of appreciating one such research enthusiast on his work. Certain rules are to be followed for paper presentation.

Date: 24/2/2018 
Timing: 10 AM to 4:30 PM
Venu: MV hall

name: ROBOTGURU
description:
✨✨ techNIEks presents techNIEzzare 2018 ✨✨
A series of technical events which will enhance your skills on the whole.

As a part of techNIEzzare a fun learning program named ROBOTGURU 🤖 is being held

ROBOTGURU is a noble initiative which seeks to teach robotics in an integrated manner interviewing hardware and software.👾

This workshop will be presided by :
Mr. Harsha S.Kikkeri,Managing Director of RobotGuru who is going to address about new technology and advancements in robotics.

Date: 23rd Feb 2018
Time: 10:00 am onwards 
Venue: Diamond Jubilee Complex

name: Anti Chess
description:
The objective is to loose al of his pieces or be stalemates.
Capturing is compulsory
King has no royal power, it too can be captured
No castling is allowed
No check or checkmate

name: Need For Speed Most Wanted
description:
All participants will be divided into various number of groups each consisting of 8 members.
Out of 8 members, best of 2 members will be selected.
RULES:
Re-entry is allowed only in the first round.
Refree's decision is final decision. 
VENUE:
Admin Block IS Lab
http://technieks.in

name: Slow Bike Race
description:
Whoever reaches the finish line last will be declared winner. Six people compete in a single race. 

Rules and regulations :

* If the competitors put their foot on the ground, they'll be disqualified. 
* Crossing of lane is prohibited.

Venue : Golden jubilee block, NIE.

name: Tattoo Making
description:
This is a temporary tattoo making contest. The tattoo by the artist should be as per the requirement. 

Rules and regulations :

* Two persons in a team (artist and on    whom the art is performed) 
* Time : 1 hour 
*  Materials required will be provided such as markers, glitter etc. 
* Design should be selected before the event and copying isn't allowed.

Venue : Golden jubilee block, NIE.
